zone/dialog_001:
Are you sure you want to receive additional
completion rewards, chosen at random?
zone/dialog_002:
Are you sure you want to receive treats that
can only be used in the Battle Villa?
zone/dialog_alert_001:
Note: Battle Villa treats don’t carry over. They’re deleted
automatically at the end of each challenge period.
zone/title_002: Select a type of bonus reward!
zone/cell_description_001:
Receive additional completion
rewards, chosen at random.
zone/cell_description_002:
Receive Battle Villa treats that
recover sync pair HP and MP.
zone/cell_description_003:
Receive Battle Villa treats that
are useful in battles.
